trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects.

A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> object can represent an element in the project, or a virtual collection of items, containing the items created after evaluating wildcards in the `Include` and `Exclude` attributes of an `Item` element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref> class.

Adds a new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> with the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name"></xref> and <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include"></xref> property values to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name"></xref> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include"></xref> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.

Adds a new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> with the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name"></xref> and <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include"></xref> property values to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>, allowing you to specify whether the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include"></xref> property value is treated as a literal.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name"></xref> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include"></xref> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
`true` to treat the itemInclude parameter as a literal value; otherwise, `false`.
The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.

Removes the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup.Condition"></xref> property value and all <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
Creates a deep or shallow copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> references the same property group as the original.
Modifications a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies.

A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> can be independently modified.

If the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> corresponds directly to a element in the project (rather than corresponding to a collection of items created after evaluating wildcards in the `Include` and `Exclude` attributes of an `Item` element), only deep copies are allowed.
`true` to create a deep copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
A copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
Gets or sets the Condition attribute value of the item group.
The Condition attribute value of the item group.
Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.

This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> for the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item group was imported into the project.
`true` if the item group was imported into the project; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> object to get or set.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
Removes the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> to remove.
Removes the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> at the specified index from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> object to remove.
Copies the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref> to a new array.
A new array containing the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects copied from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
